PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>

INSERT 
	{ 	?dist dgov:mediaType ?ftype .
		?dist dcterms:format ?format }
WHERE
	{	?dist a dcat:Distribution .
		?dist dcat:mediaType ?media
		VALUES (?media ?ftype ?format) {
			( "csv" <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/1> <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/CSV> )
			( "xlsx" <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/62> <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/XLSX> )
		}
	}
